ygData.subject: Re: Love and EQ!
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a great article, Kharlisht!! Very interesting. I have seen the flirting issue from both sides-- as i play a male and a female character, and enjoy
ygData.messageBody:
This is a great article, Kharlisht!! Very
interesting. I have seen the flirting issue from both sides--
as i play a male and a female character, and enjoy
talking, chatting and flirting all the time. When I'm in a
group, I talk a LOT between battles. I like to :wink,
/smile, /blush, etc. and like to keep everyone happy. I
would not get married (my characters or too young to be
tied down-- hehe), but I think it's fun that others
do. <br><br>Good players and people are hard to find.
I love to group with people I know, and I'm sad if
those people leave me behind (ie. get too far ahead in
levels so that we don't group together any more) or I
leave them behind. If you find someone you like playing
the game with, why not marry them? Isn't that much
like real life?? My only questions is this: If a male
char and female char, controlled by RL people from
California (or other community property state) split up--
does the femal char. get 1/2 of the male chars armor,
weapons, items and cash in bank????<br><br>Just
wondering....<br><br>Xela Orcbane<br>Druid of the 20th season<br>Tactics
Officer- Defenders of Mithril
Hall<br>Xev<br><br>Serrafina<br>Mage of the 20th summoning<br>LoreMistress- Defenders
of Mithril Hall<br>Xev
